Shah Rukh Khan Gets Chucked Out Of Forbes Richest Celeb List But His Response Is Winning Hearts
Shah Rukh Khan Gets Chucked Out Of Forbes Richest Celeb List But His Response Is Winning Hearts
Keeping with the tradition, Forbes dropped the lists ranking the world on a variety of categories, including top richest Indian celebrities.
And like every year, the list is making waves and the fans have been curious to know which celebrity tops the list. Who gets the first spot and who slips off from the list, discussions are on among fans. But do these lists and ranking really matter? Well, to Shah Rukh Khan, who has been chucked out from the list after bagging the second position last year, they don’t.
AFP
While on one hand, Shah Rukh Khan couldn't make the cut on the Forbes Richest celebrity list, it has been declared that his Twitter account is the “Most Talked Indian Accounts”. In the annual Twitter list, he has been ranked 7 on the top 10 'most talked about Indian accounts' on Twitter. He is the only Bollywood celebrity who has made it to the list that has names including Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Rahul Gandhi, Yogi Adityanath, Arvind Kejriwal and Amit Shah among others.
AFP
Don't Miss 402 SHARES 566 SHARES 343 SHARES
Being the king of wit that he is, when Shah Rukh Khan was asked about the same, he gave a hilarious response and won his fans over yet again.
“In the last three-four days I have found out that I have fallen out of a magazine's list of rich people. I've become dearer on Twitter and poorer according to the (Forbes) survey. I just hope with this film (Zero) I become nearer! So dearer, poorer and nearer in one day! That's the life of a star,” he was quoted as saying by Khaleej Times.
Meanwhile, excited for his next film, Shah Rukh Khan is busy with the promotions of Zero. He was in Dubai recently where he was greeted with the love of about 1,00,000 people.
From Lungi Dance (Chennai Express) to Chaiyya Chaiyya (Dil Se) and Tujhe Dekha Toh Ye Jaana Sanam, Shah Rukh Khan danced for his fans and the crowd went berserk.
Also starring Katrina Kaif and Anushka Sharma, Anand L Rai’s Zero is slated to release on Dec 21.
